name: Last Chance
description:
Escape from the Hell coming right to Earth in this short Platformer! :D

How To Play

Space to start and arrows to move, jump and attack.

Special attacks:

- Combo, stand still and press the down arrow.

- Dash, run and press the down arrow.

- Fall Down Slash, press the down arrow while jumping/falling to fall faster.

Story

Antoine wakes up in a school, and quickly realises that the Hell is waiting outside!

Pick up your ruler and find a solution to escape!

Other Random Things

This Game has so much glitches... I didn't have the time to patch them, just wait a bit ^^'

Made for the T-Shirt Jam! :D
